> 2) Is there any point to whirl and disasrm?  There is a 
> (questionable) value to boomerang, once you have a ton of MP, but 
> charge is clearly the best soldier ability.

disarm is pretty pointless, but whirlwind does become useful if you 
get really up there. i had a big soldier once in one of DPH's hedge 
levels use like 4 whirlwinds and then just charge up and down empty 
corridors for 10 minutes. whirlwind is also EXTREMELY useful if 
you're fighting some superpowerful badguy, because they can't hit you 
if you keep making them go backwards.

Oldschool
